meanings.definition: A small, round candy made of sugar and starch, often used as a decoration on baked goods.
meanings.sent1: The baker sprinkled colorful nonpareils on top of the cupcakes.
meanings.sent2: I love the way nonpareils add a pop of color to cookies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child arranged the nonpareils into a smiley face on the cake.
meanings.sent4: The nonpareils on the gingerbread house glistened like tiny jewels.
meanings.sent5: The jar of nonpareils looked like a confetti explosion.

meanings.definition: Having no equal; unrivaled or unparalleled.
meanings.sent1: Her talent for painting is truly nonpareils among her peers.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was nonpareils in its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The nonpareils sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.
meanings.sent4: His nonpareils skills on the piano left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The nonpareils craftsmanship of the handmade quilt was evident in every stitch.
